official_title: Shared Decision-Making Encounter Tool for Adjuvant Treatment of Lung Cancer: Randomized Control Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* CLINICIANS:
* All clinicians within identified departments participating are eligible (doctor of medicine [MD]/doctor of osteopathy [DO], fellows/residents, physician assistant [PA]/nurse practitioner [NP])
* PATIENTS:
* Adult patients (>= 18 years of age)
* Appointments at Mayo Clinic in Rochester
* Non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) stage > 1B
* Eligible by their oncologist for adjuvant treatment
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Exclude patient with major barriers to provide written informed consent or to participate in shared decision-making (i.e., dementia, severe hearing or visual impairment)
